title: Welcome to DarkAsk
desc:
We're glad you're here!
DarkAsk aims to be Usenet's #1 source on Dark City, the hit multiplayer MMORPG by ScungSoft. Click on any of the questions on the left to get started.

title: Weird NPC in Prescot Square
desc: Every time I go to prescot square there's this wierd guy standing on top of the fountain? I don't know how you climb up there. He wears the full trenchcoat set and stares at me the entire time I'm there while just repeatedly putting "..." in the chat. And he is always there. Is this part of the halloween event?

answers.desc: If this is a new NPC, I have never seen him, nor is there any information about him in the patch notes for the halloween event.
youre game is cursed lol your going to die kid

title: Concerning discussion of trading exploits
desc: We really really shouldn't have to say this, but we've decided to make this post to clear things up given that a certain few users have tried to toe the line. This is a reminder that any and all discussion, conversation, or any type of discourse whatsoever concerning any and all trading exploits, item duplication glitches, account buying or selling, etc. is STRICTLY PROHIBITED on this website. Discussion posts or replies concerning these topics will be promptly removed by our moderators and sent to our contact at ScungSoft.Additionally, if you recieve any private messages from other users related to the above, we encourage you to flag and report them. We have reason to believe that a large percentage of discussion about hacks, etc. on this site are taking place through user PMs.Please use your brains before posting. Nobody wants a repeat of last April. - Phillip, JBrenZ, 990_kat and the rest of the mod team
